title: SussLang
description: A while back I made a closure-based programming language, dubbed SussLang, in Python 3. While there are some things I would change about it, I'm still proud of the final product.

title: Aeditor
description: A tool to isolate words in human speech using AI. Written in C++17 and Python 3. Fundamentally, I used this tool to help with one of my more esoteric projects: alphebetizing videos.

title: ChocAn Redux
description: Java 15 and SQLite implementation of Chocoholics Anonymous found in Object Oriented and Classical Software Engineering, Appendix A.

title: Sums of Random Numbers and its Hidden Geometric Connections
description: During the summer I found a video by 3Blue1Brown and Numberphile that inspired me to flex my multi-dimensional calculus and probability skills. The result was this fun, semi-formal paper!

title: Mixing with Variable Rates
description: For my Differential Equations I class, we were required to create a paper discussing a mixing problem. I may have gone a bit overboard in discussing and solving it, but I'm proud of the thoroughness in the final result.
